mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expenses (admin_id, expense_type, category, amount, expense_date, description) VALUES (#{adminId}, #{expenseType}, #{category}, #{amount}, #{expenseDate}, #{description})
mapper.update: UPDATE expenses SET expense_type = #{expenseType}, category = #{category}, amount = #{amount}, expense_date = #{expenseDate}, description = #{description}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id} AND admin_id = #{adminId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM expenses WHERE id = #{id} AND admin_id = #{adminId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE id = #{id} AND admin_id = #{adminId}
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE admin_id = #{adminId} ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE admin_id = #{adminId} AND expense_type = #{expenseType} ORDER BY expense_date DESC

SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE admin_id = #{adminId} AND ( description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR expense_type LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE admin_id = #{adminId} AND category = #{category} ORDER BY expense_date DESC
